General.Name: Moller Y Perez
General.Description: Empresa Constructora Moller y Pérez Cotapos S.A. operates as a construction and real estate company in Chile. It develops and sells house and apartment projects; and constructs hospitals and clinics for third parties. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Empresa Constructora Moller y Pérez Cotapos S.A. is a subsidiary of Inversiones 957 SpA.
